title: Length (Property)
text:
PROPERTY Length : DINT
Determines the length of the string by searching for a terminating
zero character (ie. â0â or â0â). The getter will do its work either with native
IEC-(W)Strings or with strings coming from external functions. It will return -1 if
the given pointer to String is equal NULL.
